data.message: You made the recovery lp from my life style my name is Michael Souza aka Mikey Mitts! I appreciate the attention , but some peeps thought it to be a little bad for attention, I never got a cent for it from no one. I don't even havea ride I walk eeverywhere, around the streets of newbedford Massachusetts!  I love my city an I don'tdo tthing's for money most of the time anyways, ive always liked you to be my best rapper out there, well have a good life M, Mikey Mitts!:)
